subject: Delegation of Powers relating to calling of bids for tolling contracts and other issues relating to commercial operations.

Following delegation of powers have been decided in respect of tolling contracts and other issues relating to Commercial Operations: A Tolling Contracts: For invitation of RFP for tolling contract, approval of concerned Member shall be obtained, Incase, there is a deviation from the standard RFP , approval of Chairman shall be taken: ii) Constitution of Evaluation Committee and approval of technical evaluation based on recommendation of the Evaluation committee shall be approved at Member level. In case, there is rejection Or disqualification involved on issues other than the bidder not meeting the technical eligibility criteria or an issue 0f interpretation; the matter shall be placed before the Chairman: M) The bids for tolling contracts shall be approved at the Member level: In case, the bid amount of the highest bidder is less than the Annual Potential Collection, then approval of Chairman shall be obtained: B Other issues relating to Commercial Operations: For extension of tolling contracts-extension 6 months shall be approved at Member level and extensions above 6 months shall be up to Chairman for approval. i) Approval of estimates of traffic survey/revision of remittance by the tolling contractor on account of annual revision fee rate shall be approved by concerned CGM-RO iii) Approval of following special contingencies will require Chairman's approval: 6) Imposition of penalty on the tolling contractors. Claims under force majeure Termination of tolling contracts d) Fee notification proposals NHAL upto put
